returnParameters.description: () or else error upon failure to start the listener

methods.name: 'start
methods.description:
Starts the `email:ImapListener`.
```ballerina
email:Error? result = emailListener.start();
```

returnParameters.description: `()` or else a `email:Error` upon failure to register the listener

methods.name: attach
methods.description:
Binds a service to the `email:ImapListener`.
```ballerina
email:Error? result = emailListener.attach(helloService, hello);
```

returnParameters.description: `()` or else a `email:Error` upon failure to detach the service

methods.name: detach
methods.description:
Stops consuming messages and detaches the service from the `email:ImapListener`.
```ballerina
email:Error? result = emailListener.detach(helloService);
```

returnParameters.description: `()` or else a `email:Error` upon failure to stop the listener

methods.name: immediateStop
methods.description:
Stops the `email:ImapListener` forcefully.
```ballerina
email:Error? result = emailListener.immediateStop();
```

returnParameters.description: () or else error upon failure to stop the listener

methods.name: gracefulStop
methods.description:
Stops the `email:ImapListener` gracefully.
```ballerina
email:Error? result = emailListener.gracefulStop();
```

methods.name: register
methods.description:
Registers for the Email service.
```ballerina
emailListener.register(helloService, hello);
```

classes.name: PopListener
classes.description: Represents a service listener that monitors the email server location.

parameters.name: folder
parameters.description: Folder to read emails. The default value is `INBOX`

returnParameters.description:
An `email:Message` if reading the message is successful, `()` if there are no emails in the specified
folder, or else an `email:Error` if the recipient failed to receive the message

remoteMethods.name: receiveMessage
remoteMethods.description:
Reads a message.
```ballerina
email:Message|email:Error emailResponse = imapClient->receiveMessage();
```

returnParameters.description: An `email:Error` if the recipient failed to close the client or else `()`

remoteMethods.name: close
remoteMethods.description:
Close the client.
```ballerina
email:Error? closeResponse = imapClient->close();
```

returnParameters.description: An `email:Error` if failed while creating the client or else `()`

methods.description: Gets invoked during the `email:ImapClient` initialization.

clients.name: ImapClient
clients.description: Represents an IMAP Client, which interacts with an IMAP Server.

parameters.name: folder
parameters.description: Folder to read the emails. The default value is `INBOX`

returnParameters.description:
An `email:Message` if reading the message is successful,
`()` if there are no emails in the specified folder,
or else an `email:Error` if the recipient failed to receive the message

remoteMethods.name: receiveMessage
remoteMethods.description:
Reads a message.
```ballerina
email:Message|email:Error? emailResponse = popClient->receiveMessage();
```

returnParameters.description: An `email:Error` if the recipient failed to close the client or else `()`

remoteMethods.name: close
remoteMethods.description:
Close the client.
```ballerina
email:Error? closeResponse = popClient->close();
```

returnParameters.description: An `email:Error` if creating the client failed or else `()`

methods.name: init
methods.description: Gets invoked during the `email:PopClient` initialization.

parameters.name: folder
parameters.description: Folder to read the emails. The default value is `INBOX`

returnParameters.description:
An `email:Message` if reading the message is successful,
`()` if there are no emails in the specified folder,
or else an `email:Error` if the recipient failed to receive the message

methods.name: receiveMessage
methods.description:
Reads a message.
```ballerina
email:Message|email:Error? emailResponse = popClient->receiveMessage();
```

returnParameters.description: An `email:Error` if the recipient failed to close the client or else `()`

methods.name: close
methods.description:
Close the client.
```ballerina
email:Error? closeResponse = popClient->close();
```

returnParameters.description: An `email:Error` if creating the client failed or else `()`

clients.name: PopClient
clients.description: Represents a POP Client, which interacts with a POP Server.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: An `email:Message` message, which needs to be sent to the recipient

returnParameters.description: An `email:Error` if failed to send the message to the recipient or else `()`

remoteMethods.name: sendMessage
remoteMethods.description:
Sends an email message.
```ballerina
email:Error? response = smtpClient->sendMessage(email);
```

returnParameters.description:
An `email:Error` if failed to send the message to
the recipient or else `()`

remoteMethods.name: send
remoteMethods.description:
Sends an email message with optional parameters.
```ballerina
email:Error? response = smtpClient->send(toAddress, subject, fromAddress,
  emailBody, sender="eve@abc.com");
```

returnParameters.description: An `email:Error` if failed to initialize or else `()`

methods.name: init
methods.description: Gets invoked during the `email:SmtpClient` initialization.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: An `email:Message` message, which needs to be sent to the recipient

returnParameters.description: An `email:Error` if failed to send the message to the recipient or else `()`

methods.name: sendMessage
methods.description:
Sends an email message.
```ballerina
email:Error? response = smtpClient->sendMessage(email);
```

returnParameters.description:
An `email:Error` if failed to send the message to
the recipient or else `()`

methods.name: send
methods.description:
Sends an email message with optional parameters.
```ballerina
email:Error? response = smtpClient->send(toAddress, subject, fromAddress,
  emailBody, sender="eve@abc.com");
```

returnParameters.description: An `email:Error` if failed to initialize or else `()`

clients.name: SmtpClient
clients.description: Represents an SMTP Client, which interacts with an SMTP Server.

errors.name: Error
errors.description: Defines the common error type for the module.

members.name: START_TLS_AUTO
members.description: If STARTTLS exists use it else use plaintext

members.name: START_TLS_ALWAYS
members.description: Use STARTTLS if not available throw error

modules.summary: This module provides APIs to perform email operations such as sending and reading emails using the SMTP, POP3, and IMAP4 protocols.
